content: Fix contribution types and add missing interfaces for claim/fund operations
Create PayPal SDK integration and payment processing utilities
Implement fund contribution store with PayPal integration
Build ContributionList component for displaying all contributions
Create ContributionCard component for individual contribution display
Build ContributionForm for adding new task contributions
Create FundTracker component for monetary contributions and budgets
Build fund contribution form with PayPal integration
Create custom hooks for contribution and fund management
Create ContributionAnalytics component for organizer insights
Add anonymous contribution support across all components
Implement real-time contribution updates using Firebase listeners
